Projects

Projects (18)
Micro- and macrofactors affecting vertical distribution of Tardigrada in temperate forest
Project
Goals: 1) To examine the diversity and vertical distribution of tardigrade species inhabiting mosses growing on trees in forests of central/west Poland. 2) To identify the mechanisms that determine the vertical distribution of tardigrades inhabiting epiphytic mosses. 3) To conduct experiments on the pace and patterns of colonization of epiphytic mosses by various species of tardigrades.
View
Cryptobiosis and encystment
Project
The main goal of the project is to investigate, analyze and describe the cryptobiosis and encystment in tardigrades.
View
Digestive system of tardigrades
Project
Analysis of the digestive system of tardigrades according to different stressors (haevy metals, ibuprofen, paracetamol).
